summary: A fictionalized account of the career of jazz singer Ruth Etting and her tempestuous marriage to gangster Marty Snyder, who helped propel her to stardom.

keywords: bad temper|fired from a job|taxi dancer|roaring twenties|singer
title: Quiéreme o déjame
